text:
Here's my idea for @_buildspace + @_nightsweekends:

I have a capsule wardrobe but (ironically) still spend time debating what to wear every morning. 

I want my phone to make that decision for me instead -- simple as that :) https://t.co/PsTA6A32y4

user_info.name: Frank
user_info.description: Consultant by day, stillfiguringitout on nights + weekends
